passage_text: The Sun was right to publish scoop of the Queen giving a Nazi salute. Why the 17-second footage is justified as being of genuine historical interest. Sun cover. Photograph: TheSun/Twitter/PA.

The Right Scoop is a conservative media news blog. Politics get the most headlines and visitors may register to leave comments. In addition to breaking news, The Right Scoop follows the real-time Twitter feeds of conservatives Mark Levin and Michelle Malkin. At CPAC 2012, The Right Scoop won the Best News Blog award.
